name: Mystical Island
description:
Mystical Island is a 2D RPG with elements of survival in which you will have to survive on the island and try to leave it.

Your ship has crashed.Your team is most likely dead.You find yourself on some mystical island and you need to survive and get out of this island, because danger awaits you at every step.To survive, you will have to explore the island, fight monsters, hunt animals, cook food, make yourself equipment from improvised materials.

Key Features :

- open world

- change of day and night

- the ability to craft equipment

- Many different enemies
